description:
These shoe covers provide the warmth and weather protection you want for those less-than-ideal weather rides. Primaloft® Gold insulation provides lightweight warmth and the anatomic design prevents bunching.

  • 3-layer AmFIB® softshell material is wind- and water-resistant
  • 100g Primaloft® Gold insulation adds warmth
  • Hook-and-loop closure for easy on and off
  • Reflective elements keep you visible on low-light rides
name: Pearl Izumi Amfib Shoe Cover - Unisex
